message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.LG 

The paper deals with computer vision techniques for rotoscoping, which involves segmenting objects in video frames. This falls under the category of computer vision (cs.CV). The paper proposes a novel appearance model for capturing and tracking the visual aspect of an object in a scene, which involves both local and global appearance models. This suggests that the paper may also fall under the sub-categories of graphics (cs.GR) and multimedia (cs.MM). The paper also involves optimization techniques for efficient iterative optimization, which suggests that it may fall under the sub-categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG).
